webforest 0.2.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Modify theme colors

Source: R/classes-theme.R
set_colors.Rd

Pipe-friendly function to modify specific color properties of a theme.

set_colors(
  theme,
  background = NULL,
  foreground = NULL,
  primary = NULL,
  secondary = NULL,
  accent = NULL,
  muted = NULL,
  border = NULL,
  interval = NULL,
  interval_positive = NULL,
  interval_negative = NULL,
  interval_neutral = NULL,
  interval_line = NULL,
  summary_fill = NULL,
  summary_border = NULL
)

Arguments

theme

A WebTheme object

background

Background color (default: "#ffffff")

foreground

Primary text color (default: "#333333")

primary

Primary accent color for markers and highlights (default: "#0891b2")

secondary

Secondary text/UI color (default: "#64748b")

accent

Accent color for emphasis (default: "#8b5cf6")

muted

Muted/disabled text color (default: "#94a3b8")

border

Border color for containers and dividers (default: "#e2e8f0")

interval

Default marker/interval color (default: "#0891b2")

interval_positive

Deprecated. Color for favorable effects.

interval_negative

Deprecated. Color for unfavorable effects.

interval_neutral

Color for neutral effects (default: "#64748b")

interval_line

Confidence interval line color (default: "#475569")

summary_fill

Summary diamond fill color (default: "#0891b2")

summary_border

Summary diamond border color (default: "#0e7490")

Value

Modified WebTheme object

Examples

web_theme_jama() |>
  set_colors(primary = "#0066cc", border = "#999999")
#> <webforest::WebTheme>
#>  @ name         : chr "jama"
#>  @ colors       : <webforest::ColorPalette>
#>  .. @ background       : chr "#ffffff"
#>  .. @ foreground       : chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ primary          : chr "#0066cc"
#>  .. @ secondary        : chr "#333333"
#>  .. @ accent           : chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ muted            : chr "#555555"
#>  .. @ border           : chr "#999999"
#>  .. @ interval         : chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ interval_line    : chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ interval_positive: chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ interval_negative: chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ interval_neutral : chr "#555555"
#>  .. @ summary_fill     : chr "#000000"
#>  .. @ summary_border   : chr "#000000"

#>  .. @ font_size_sm      : chr "8pt"
